outputs.output_descr: Supporting the implementation process of the EU Directives 2003/87/EC and 2009/29/EC in the Country by utilizing Bulgarian experiencein the field of monitoring, reporting and verification of greenhouse gas emissions as well as emission trading.

project_descr: Bulgarian Fast Start Finance Contribution 2011 – 2012: Utilizing Bulgarian Experience in Monitoring, Reporting and Verification of Greenhouse Gas Emissions required for participation in the European Union Emission Trading Scheme
